SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.Gui.guiControllers

Class ViewFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.ObserverImplementation.Observable<OBS_Message>
it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Gui.guiControllers.ViewFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer<ClientModel,Message>, Runnable
public class ViewFactory extends View implements Observer<ClientModel,Message>
This class manages the creation of stages, the succession of scenes and their changes that characterise the game. The main responsibilities is to interact with specific "guiControllers" to direct interactions among users, stages and scenes.
Author:
Alberto Aniballi

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ViewFactory()
    It is the constructor of the class, it has the main responsibility of adding an observer to the super class "clientModel" attribute.

      public void showStart()
      This method is used to instantiate the main stage and to load the first scene on it, the scene is the "start" scene. After the scene is correctly loaded, the stage is shown.

    • onInvalidUsername

      public void onInvalidUsername()
      This method is used to instantiate the "InvalidUsername" scene on a new stage during the pre-game phase. It shows the form that collect the new username that the user will use.
      Specified by:
      onInvalidUsername in class View

    • lobbyUpdate

      public void lobbyUpdate(String string)
      This method is used to update the lobby information including the name of the new player and the new number of players actually connected to the game lobby. In particular, it changes the scene root with the "Accepted Login" scene.
      Specified by:
      lobbyUpdate in class View
      Parameters:

    • showColumnQuestion

      public void showColumnQuestion()
      This method is used to create "the column question" stage to the player that has just chosen object cards from grid. In particular, it gives players the possibility to select the library column in which they want to insert object cards.

    • showLibrary

      public void showLibrary(ObjectCard[][] library, String username, Position[] oldGrid, Position[] newLibrary)
      Update library in board. If update is after a move, it calls an animation.
      Specified by:
      showLibrary in class View
      Parameters:
      library - : previous library;
      username - : the player username;
      oldGrid - : the old grid;
      newLibrary - : updated library;

    • printAll

    • onBadMoveAnswer

      Specified by:

    • errorCreatingClient

      public void errorCreatingClient(String chosenAddress, int chosenPort)
      This method is used to instantiate the "ErrorClientCreation" scene during the pre-game phase. This scene warn the user that there was a problem during the creation of its player to participate in the game.
      Specified by:
      errorCreatingClient in class View
      Parameters:
      chosenAddress - : the server address chosen by the player
      chosenPort - : the port chosen by the player

    • showInvalidPort

      public void showInvalidPort(String error_message)
      This method is used to instantiate the "InvalidPort" stage in the case a player chosen an invalid port. This stage locks the interaction with previous stage.

    • showInvalidNumPlayers

      public void showInvalidNumPlayers()
      This method is used to instantiate the "InvalidNumPlayers" stage in the case a player chosen an invalid number of players. This stage locks the interaction with previous stage.

    • showInvalidNumberOfCards

      public void showInvalidNumberOfCards()
      This method is used to instantiate the "InvalidNumObjCards" stage in the case a player chosen an invalid number of object cards from the grid. This stage locks the interaction with previous stage.
